documentation.text:
@title This library is a set of functions meant to handle CBOR serialization and deserialization for bytes
 @author Zondax AG

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct CBOR.CBORBuffer memory) pure returns (bytes memory)
function (struct CBOR.CBORBuffer memory) pure returns (bytes memory)
